column1: Art Institute of Chicago////This was my first visit to the Art Institute and I was not disappointed. The museum is very large and sprawling. Get a map! Plan for at least a couple hours. I spent three. Make sure you see the heavy hitters of the collection (American Gothic
column4: etc) but don't buzz past the rest getting there. The AI has tons of great European and American modern art. I spent a long time with the collection of Georgia O'keeffes
column5: many I'd never seen before even in books.
